description: A framework for creating web applications with VFP.
FGL is high performance 3D graphics application framework based on OpenGL, SOIL (Simple OpenGL Image Library), Assimp, Freetype and OpenMesh
Fox Server Pages is a Visual Foxpro multithreaded webserver
Export your Visual FoxPro reports to Images, RTF, PDF, HTML or XLS super easy! Send them by email! Enhance the look of your previews, and allow your users to decide how their report previews will be.
Generate pure XLS files with formatting without MSOFFICE installed.
An IQToolkit Provider that adds the ability to use Visual FoxPro Data as a LINQ data source.
A wrapper for the .NET System.Data.OleDb classes.
An Entity Framework Data Provider that adds the ability to use Visual FoxPro Data as an Entity Framework data source.
Git utilities for VFP, designed to work within the Thor repository (Mike Potjer)
